product_name: Sugoi RPM Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Sugoi RPM Bike Jersey offers high-performance construction, fit and detailing for recreational riders. Polyester jersey wicks away sweat and dries quickly. Flat seams add comfort. Zone construction features mesh panels for airflow and breathability. Full-length zipper aids ventilation. Sugoi RPM Bike Jersey for men has 3 rear pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Sugoi RPM Bike Jersey offers high-performance construction, fit and detailing for recreational riders.
